definition: to keep at a distance/to forsake
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

sentences.english: The great walks with the small without fear。 The middling keeps aloof。
sentences.chinese: 大的不怕與小的同遊，居中的卻遠避之。

sentences.english: The great walks with the small without fear. The middling keeps aloof.
sentences.chinese: 大的不怕與小的同油居中的卻遠避之。

sentences.english: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
sentences.chinese: 小子們哪，你們要自守，遠避偶像。

sentences.english: Always be ready to speak your mind, and a base man will avoid you.
sentences.chinese: 時刻準備說出你的心聲，奸佞之徒自然就會遠避。

sentences.english: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication
sentences.chinese: 神的旨意就是要你們成爲聖潔，遠避淫行。

sentences.english: They blessed themselves from such salesmen.
sentences.chinese: 他們遠避這樣的推銷員。
